# Mixed Test Secrets - FAKE VALUES FOR TESTING ONLY
# Various secret types from different providers

# Slack Bot Token (np.slack.1)
# Pattern: xoxb-[0-9]+-[0-9]+-[a-zA-Z0-9]+
SLACK_BOT_TOKEN=xoxb-123456789012-123456789012-xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

# Stripe Secret Key (np.stripe.1)
# Pattern: sk_live_[a-zA-Z0-9]{24,99}
STRIPE_SECRET_KEY=sk_live_xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

# SendGrid API Key (np.sendgrid.1)
# Pattern: SG\.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{22}\.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{43}
SENDGRID_API_KEY=SG.xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx.xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

# Twilio Auth Token (np.twilio.1)
# Pattern: \b[a-f0-9]{32}\b (with context)
TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID=ACxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

# Generic Private Key Header
-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
MIIEowIBAAKCAQEAtestfakekeyxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----

# OpenAI API Key (np.openai.1)
OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
